short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your school experience with the help of AI!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your productivity with AI! 🚀 Summarize books, articles, and PDFs swiftly. Rewrite content, summarize, and more online, saving you hours weekly. Now featuring Humanizer for AI detection and privacy.

Key Features:

Rewrite: Edit and refine sentences and paragraphs. ✨
- EZWrite-GPT: Generate answers and content effortlessly. 💡
- Essay Generator: Describe an outline, intro, and voila! 📝
- Find tool: Explore and find answers in websites, articles, and PDFs. 🔍
- Text Humanizer: Modify AI text to bypass detectors. 🛡️
- Summarizer: Condense content from books, articles, and PDFs. 📚

Extras:
- Sentence writer, use the ctrl + shift + q short cut to write the next sentence, or ctrl + shift + w for the next parargraph. 🎩
- AI Humanizer: Pass AI detectors with enhanced text. 🕵️‍♂️


These features work in PDFs, Google Docs, Linkedin, Gmail, and News websites!

Need help writing? 📝 EZWrite turns your thoughts into words, generating new sentences and paragraphs.
